# Tender Notice

## W7702-236366 Medical Advisor

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) issues the following tender notice for the services of a Medical Advisor for Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC) at Suffield Research Centre (SRC).

**Tender Details**

| **Information** | **Value** |
| --- | --- |
| Tender Reference Number | WS4087476109-Doc4087614213 |
| Solicitation Number | WS4087476109 |
| Tender Closing Date and Time | September 6, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT |
| Expected Contract Start Date | November 1, 2023 |
| Expected Contract End Date | October 31, 2027 |

**Project Description**

DRDC SRC requires the services of a Medical Advisor who is licensed by the College of Physicians and Surgeons of Alberta (CPSA) and possesses medical knowledge and experience to advise on hazards affecting the health and safety of DRDC SRC personnel working in a Chemical, Biological, Radiological, and/or Nuclear (CBRN) environment. The Medical Advisor will also be responsible for administering a vaccination program, applying to the Health Canada Special Access Programme (SAP) for the use of unlicensed drugs, and overseeing an acetylcholinesterase monitoring program.

**Request for Proposal**

The tender is issued as a Request for Proposal (RFP). The selection criteria for this tender is the Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price.

**Eligibility Requirements**

To be eligible, the bidder must be a Canadian company that is registered in Alberta and has a valid certificate of good standing from the College of Physicians and Surgeons of Alberta (CPSA).

**Contact Information**

For further information or to submit a bid, please contact:

* Matthew Havrilenko, PSPC/SPAC, at [matthew.havrilenko@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:matthew.havrilenko@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Notice URL**
